items.sentence: Don\'t you want all your friends to come to your party and celebrate with you?
I had to cancel that order because we didn\'t have enough money to pay for it.
I managed to catch the 8 o\'clock train by running all the way to the station.
Tom came to the conclusion that no matter what he did, Mary wouldn\'t like it.
Tom used to have a penpal in Australia that he wrote to several times a month.
